text: Inse poocho, kaun tumko aasman aur zameen se rizq deta hai? Yeh samaat (hearing) aur beenayi (vision) ki quwwatein kiske ikhtiyar mein hai? Kaun be-jaan mein se jaandaar ko aur jaandaar mein se be-jaan ko nikalta hai? Kaun is nazm e alam ki tadbeer kar raha hai(governs all affairs of the universe)? Woh zaroor kahenge ke Allah, Kaho phir tum (haqeeqat ke khilaf chalne se) parheiz nahin karte
